comments.body: Great idea, man. This is a really good idea for those who want to hold more blocks or items than allowed in their inventories, and especially for if you need supplies to survive in the sky because they should also allow blocks to be temporarily placed on top of the Happy Ghast, like beds, so you can skip over the night while on the go.

Yes, that is a good idea, though there is a possible way to do this without chests on the Ghast. You can put a chest on llamas and put a lead on each llama and then crouch and right click the Ghast, this allows the llamas with chests to hang from the Ghast giving you basically the same effect as chests on the Ghast. Though it would be easier for chests to be directly attached to Happy Ghasts.
I really just want more use for the 3000 cactus I have.
Absolutely and in Mexico is common to see dry out cactus which really surprise me that they look exactly like wood but more brittle.

I feel like that should be apart of the new cactus that was showed inside that mob vote from a couple years (which I believe only spawned in Mesas). While the current cactus only would spawn in Deserts

I love this idea, I think different colours could really help me with decorating and making my builds feel more alive at night. 
I was thinking maybe instead we could use dye on the bushes to change the colour of the Fireflies similar to how sheep dye works.
"Fireeye" Bushes would be a very nice touch! They could have orange and yellow particles instead of just yellow so they look more like the creaking's eyes!
is a good idea!!!
In single player mode, the locator bar should be used to show you the location of your pets, the color of the dot on the bar should match the color of the pets collar

Yes, I totally agree. A small picture of the player's face would be much better. Also if they belonged to a team an outline with specific color could show up. Apart from that I would like the locator bar to be a completely separate part of the UI. It could be located above the boss bar. It would let us see the XP.

Another possible solution is to still display XP bar while displaying the player's dots.
It would be nice in general to have the option to apply and make custom colormaps and overlays for items using json files
I want Mojang to keep the old spawn eggs.
wait, programmer art do not revert it?

No not unless you use the Beta Texture Pack or use a previous version. Thats why I suggested this so people dont need to use the older textures to see the classic spawn eggs. Some people are not going to like the new spawn eggs even if they like the textures of everything else.
Luckily there are resource packs for you to use
YES. The spawn egg "update" should've never happened in the first place.
Programmer art reverts it now!
i hope it will be a options for sopports old texture pack
more biome villages would be awesome

Yes, with this new system they are doing using specific conditions inside the world like the sand noises. The vines on the jungle trees could make the ambient noises. This is also an opportunity to add a variety of colorful plants to the jungle; at the same time adding a variety of colorful sounds to your surroundings.

I want them to kinda go off on this one.
Make mushrooms be able to be placed on the side of blocks. so in  the swamp they are on the sides of trees like in real life.

A alternative to having no leaf litter at all would to have the leaf litter generate in decrease density from the trunks of trees, this makes sense as there is more leaves there. It would also blend the leaf litter better into the environment as at the moment they appear out of place. If you still want leaf litter in forest and agree it feels out of place, vote this comment up.
Variation in amount of leaf litter per biome would be better
Leaf litter generation should either be decreased or the color should more closely match the grass or leaf color.
Name it "Los Pollos Hermanos"
Oh my, Its "With our powers combined" all over again
the blue one is called the cool chicken i like the name of it
I think we could use glow berry, sweet berry and apple to made different flavors

That would be cool as well as the idea for extra ingredients, maybe toppers you add after making the cake to give it flare. Although I would like to Food Dye the cake with normal dyes mixed with milk and maybe another ingredient, using normal dye could make it a poison cake.
My house is already afraid of lightning
It will look so cool in the sky!
a visual meteor shower that only appears in the sky as shooting stars would be very nice
would be awesome!
maybe you could also strip cactuses like logs to make them edible?
Sounds good, it's a minor food source for the desert and adds a function to the flower.
maybe they could give a special effect. maybe in sus stew it would be a positive effect like haste, fire res, or something new
Love this idea!
How about using honey instead of bonemeal? (since they're insects), It would give honey an additional use.
How about firefly color variants? (yellow, green, white)
thats not a king thats a legend
TECHNOBLADE NEVER DIES
This would be really good for deserts. Fennic Foxes would be so easy to be added as a fox variant. Besides they are cute.

more desert mobs in general would be cool. 

i like the idea of lizards and/or snakes too.
I agree! However ow should it be done? Should certain enchantments come first when there's multiple enchantments? (Like Fire Aspect, Silk Touch, etc). I think so!
it is a very good idea although I don't know how it would be applied.
Cool Ideas, also do Grasshoppers, ants, flies, termites, cockroaches, and best of all, Mosquito
Buona idea!
Maybe you can shear it like a sheep to get wool?
Yes. The willow would go well if it was introduced in a cold swamp biome. As well as having a cold swamp biome could open up the idea for new plants.

First: Maybe instead of saying "this shouldn't be added because it contradicts the original interpretation of the lore" you could instead say "Oh, maybe we should adapt our theories now that this new piece of information was made public" who knows maybe the nether used to be much more damp at the time of the Ghasts. Maybe Ghast have pregnancies and the reason the dried ghast is dry is because there's no water provided to it by the mother who knows? Heck I'd say the addition of the dried ghast is beneficial because now we know more about the Ghasts than before

Second: I doubt people are going to have multiple ghasts, especially when the ghast can fit 4 players on it.

I agree with your last point but honestly it's still a good new exploration and building tool, it outweighs all of its cons
see the game theory video about the nether. so lorewise it works, for your other complaints it is just a personal thing
they are dried and i think ghasts are from the overworld in the origin

They seem like a cheap solution and out of line with the rest of the game, if anything they should be as rare and as difficult to obtain as elytra, I will not be updating my server beyond 1.21.5 unless it is removed or is made optional.
100% agree
however happy ghasts move REALLY slow (about slower then sprinting)
the nether must have been a waterous region in the past, as there is basalt which needs water to form. and the fact that ghasts are made with water only reinforces that idea.

Happy Ghast make me sad because I have always loved Ghasts and have wanted to fly on them/let them fly around peacefully but with the inclusion of Happy Ghasts it just means that all Ghasts are born sad and will never be happy and I dislike that I can't do anything about that. For me I wish Happy Ghasts didn't exist. I don't want Happy Ghasts I want to make Ghasts happy.
Maybe nether ghasts "hydrate" in lava and that's why they spit explosions

I'm glad there's someone else who agrees. These drops are complete nonsense. Either they're too small, or they add some crazy nonsense, like that ghast. This mob is completely illogical and deserves to be either redesigned or removed. And in response to some commenters, no one should have to adapt Minecraft lore to the sick ideas of developers that arose after consuming some bad stuff.
pd: to get the new dry ghast on the nether gravel when using a brush
